Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: I just LOVE this place. Their sandwiches with homemade bread are delicious, filling, value for money (5.95‚Ç¨), fresh and can be really healthy as well. I am also.wondering how they make all their cakes so fluffy ?? ‚Ä¶

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Really nice delicatessen, friendly staff, good coffee (with a small piece or really, really good cake). Sells expert Italian ingredients. The only shop in the city that sells Drinken Monkey Limoncello (which won many awards, and now sits in our fridge). Unfortunately, their meatball parmesan sandwiches were sold out. Will need to return.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Great Italian cafe and store!

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Delicious Italian food, groceries and sweets, combined with the friendliest service in town. And the best cappuccinos! Definitely recommended, a delightful place.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Great drinks, food and service. Try their charcuterie sometime!

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Authentic Italian place, cannelloni are delicious also their sandwiches, made with products form Italy. Good for lunch or a quick snack

Name: Alberto Pozzetto

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: A must go to place for great coffee, pastas, cakes and ingredients for home cooking. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Delicious food and very kind staff!  Highly recommend Alberto Pozzetto.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Our go to coffee spot in the neighborhood. They make best cappuccinos and espresso machiattos. You cannot go wrong with any of the sandwiches or pastries. It is also a great place to try out Italian wares specially wines and olive oil.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Delicious Italian food definitely give it a try üòÄ

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Perfecto! My weekly go to for lunch time sandwiches and takeaway prepared pasta and salads. Alberto is a small yet bustling establishment located in the busy de Pijp center catering to locals and travelers in need a little taste of Italy.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: So far the place with the best Italian espresso and croissants. Also worth to mention price, that is lower than the average in Amsterdam. Also a lot of Italian products, from cookies, to drinks and cheese.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Awesome Sandwhiches loaded with flavour and superb ingredients, huge and well well worth the money - impressive.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto

Review Text: Delicious food, great breakfast and coffee that really tastes like Italy üáÆüáπ Big Thank You to the people who sat outside and made us walk in!

Review Text: Ordered: Melanzane w bread and a Tiramisu just now and for the first time I actually called a place to thank for the take-away food. Must admit, a bit impulsive but the owner deserved it. Absolutely delicious.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Great place which opens up during the weekend at 8.30am where all the others in my area are still closed. Nice staff and real Italian coffee!

Name: Alberto Pozzetto
Review Text: Gezellig little cafe next to Albert Cuyp market. Its got many Vegetarians options and great tasting coffee. Also got outside setting for people watching. I tried few salads and they were awesome.

Name: Alberto Pozzetto

Name: Alberto Pozzetto

Review Text: This is currently the best place in de Pijp for a good coffee. By a long shot. Luckily it doesn‚Äôt do yuppy breakfasts so it‚Äôs not yet invaded by unmannerly people with suitcases on wheels.
